name: Blaster (vlad79x)
description:
Endless Action FPS made for Epic Mega Jam 2022

Stay alive using your 2 weapons while also following the rules of the game modes, combine continuous movement and aim to get the best possible highscore!

WASD - move

Space - jump

Left Click - shoot

Q - in game -> switch weapons / in menu - switch difficulty

Esc - pause and unpause

R - restart level

Tab - go back to menu

E - in menu -> show how to play
